links.title: GM to cut 680 Spring Hill jobs, but build new Cadillac SUV at plant
links.description: Getahn Ward | USA TODAY NETWORK - Tennessee 6:04 am CDT September 26, 2017 STORY HIGHLIGHTS The layoffs are expected to occur effective Nov. 27. "Moderating" sales is leading GM to cut the overnight shift at the Spring Hill plant. GM has 3,750 employees at the plant, which makes the GMC Acadia and Cadillac XT.

links.title: Amid Management Exodus, Tesla Fires Hundreds Of Workers
links.description: In an absurd demonstration of Musk's bizarre management style, the company said the mass terminations have "generally boosted worker morale", as high-performing employees have been rewarded. it was unclear what the 700 layoffs, pardon, exit events did to worker morale.
